synopsis.text: Tsubuyakky, Suzukky, and Bimajo, agents of the world's largest textbook company, History Paradise, are determined to keep history as it was written in the textbooks. But in the 24th century, the invention of the time machine, "Time Bokan," reveals that the history we know is all wrong! Enter Tokio, a junior high student from our time, who is recruited by Karen, a girl from the future, to join the Space-Time Administrative Bureau (JKK). Together, they embark on a thrilling journey through time, uncovering the true history that has been hidden from us all along. From Cleo and Patra, the comic duo behind Cleopatra's legend, to Momotar≈ç, who is more ogre than the ogres themselves, Tokio and Karen use the 24 Bokan Mecha to battle the villainous Akudarma and uncover the truth about history. Will they succeed in their mission to reveal the true history to the world? Join Tokio and Karen on their exciting adventure and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
